details.description: This is a system for managing RTI applications.

details.Job Description: The Financial Analyst will be responsible for financial planning, budgeting, and forecasting. The selected candidate will work full-time and will not undertake any other job or work apart from being a full-time financial analyst during the contract period.
details.Selection Process: The candidates will be selected based on an interview process.
details.Tenure: The service of the Financial Analyst will be for a contractual period of one year, which can be extended as per the recommendations of the Committee up on the same privity of contract or as per the existing Government policy on that time as the case may be.
details.Conditions and Limitations: The appointed candidate shall not be convicted/racing any criminal investigation or enquiry. The salary is consolidated in nature hence there shall not be any allowances and increments but subjected to TDS as per Rules only.
